attributes.action: Lower the minimum employment time for unfair/constructive dismissal claims.
attributes.additional_details: The government are the ones capable of changing the criteria for these claims.
attributes.background: To change the minimum employment length from 2 years for unfair and constructive dismissal claims to allow those bullied out of jobs a chance to formally resolve the issue. This will also help hold those employers and mangers who allow or actively participate in the bullying of staff accountable.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658661
